name: On Company Time
description:
Vaguely Damp Games brings you the game where procrastination actually earns you points! Find other things to do around the office to delay the inevitable moment where work actually needs to get done in this office style game. Tap your way around the office to waste the endless hours while accruing your salary. Get extra time to complete work tasks by doing meaningless activities but don’t forget that work email or you forfeit your paycheck!

Music:

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4509-the-show-must-be-go
